Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the gymnastics horizontal bar at a nearby track and field. What are your next steps?  
choose:  
A. I rise.  
B. I decline.  
C. I rotate the camera to the left.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I turn right.  
F. I fly forward.  
G. I rotate the camera to the right.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The initial position shows a view of the basketball court, and to navigate towards the gymnastics horizontal bar at the nearby track and field, turning right would align the path towards the track area where such equipment is typically located.
